title: LG Led 70 cm (28 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (28LH454A)

product_specification.Aspect Ratio: 16:09, Just Scan, Original, 4:3, 14:9, Zoom, Cinema Zoom
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: AC3(Dolby Digital), AAC, Mpeg, MP3, PCM
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Sound Optimizer: 3 Modes (Off, Stand Type, Wall-mounted Type)
product_specification.Component In (RGB Cable): Component Input (Y, Pb, Pr + Audio): 1 (Rear) (Composite / Component Common)
product_specification.Composite In (Audio Video Cable): Component Input (Y, Pb, Pr + Audio): 1 (Rear) (Composite / Component Common)
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Damages caused to the product by accident, lightening, ingress of water, fire, dropping or excessive shock

product_description.LED - On the Edge of your Sofa: Enjoy crystal-clear images, true blacks and authentic life-like colours on a slim screen with the awesome LED backlighting display in this LG LED HD Ready LED TV.
product_description.All Round Protection - Bears it All: Your TV will be protected against lightning, summer heat, humidity, dust, shock, thanks to the All Round Safety feature in this television. This TV also works without a stabilizer.
